detectors.description:
ApyOracle.getApy(address,bool,address,uint256,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ApyOracle__5.sol#163-187) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-1e8 * (auscPriceAmounts[2] * incentive * (52 / howManyWeeks)) / (poolBalance * stakeTokenPrice) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ApyOracle__5.sol#184-186)
